alert.note: Alert for Cass; Lancaster; Saline; Sarpy; Saunders (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 10:44PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Sarpy, Lancaster, east central Saline, southeastern Saunders and western Cass Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1044 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles east of Ceresco to 4 miles south of Crete. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ceresco around 1050 PM CDT. Greenwood around 1055 PM CDT. Ashland around 1100 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Sprague, Roca, Gretna and Hickman. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 395 and 432. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
